Description: A federal judge imposed a fine and ordered a period of probation for a Harlan County underground mining company that had violated mandatory safety and health standards established by the Mine Safety Health Administration.
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/usao-edky/pr/harlan-county-mining-company-sentenced-violation-health-and-safety-standards
Contained in data received from the agency on October 23, 2020 in response to an open records request.
